code: import _objectSpread from"C:/carrera/FullStackOpenCourse/part2/guia_telefonica/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";import axios from'axios';var base_url='http://localhost:3001/api/persons';var getAll=function getAll(){var request=axios.get(base_url);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var add=function add(person){var request=axios.post(base_url,person);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var borrar=function borrar(person){var request=axios.delete("".concat(base_url,"/").concat(person.id));return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var actualizar=function actualizar(persons,newName,newPhone){var person=persons.find(function(persona){return newName.localeCompare(persona.name)===0;});var changedPer=_objectSpread(_objectSpread({},person),{},{number:newPhone});var request=axios.put("".concat(base_url,"/").concat(person.id),changedPer);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};export default{getAll:getAll,add:add,borrar:borrar,actualizar:actualizar};
